wikipedia_page.main: Dax O'Callaghan (born 2 July 1982 in London, England) is an English singer, dancer and actor. Once referred to as the Prince of Pop in France during the success of his debut single in the early 2000s, Dax is recognized throughout many European territories as a successful entertainer through his accomplishments in music on the European Pop Charts.

response: * Dax O'Callaghan (born 1986), English singer, dancer and actor

Lexington Bridge or otherwise known as LXB was put together in mid-2006 as a boy band by Universal Music after a worldwide search. The group consists of Rob Uncles from the US, Nye Oakley, Dax O'Callaghan and Jerome Simeon from Great Britain and Ephraïm Beks from the Netherlands.
